languages.text: "Как прикажешь". {n}Мрачно вздохнув и метнув в Комиссара яростный взгляд, Арджента веско произносит:{/n} "Мы еще не закончили, Иако Сотний. Ты получил отсрочку приговора, но не помилование".
"As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажешь". {n}Мрачно вздохнув и метнув в Комиссара яростный взгляд, Арджента веско произносит:{/n} "Мы еще не закончили, Иако Сотний. Ты получил отсрочку приговора, но не помилование".

traits.locale_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This wasn't a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如你所愿。”{n}阿洁塔恶狠狠地叹了口气。她瞪着政委，话语中充满了决绝。{/n}“我们的事情还没有结束，伊科·索蒂尼。这并不是赦免，只是缓刑而已。”
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿。”{n}阿洁塔恶狠狠地叹了口气。她瞪着政委，话语中充满了决绝。{/n}“我们的事情还没有结束，伊科·索蒂尼。这并不是赦免，只是缓刑而已。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「仰せのままに」{n}アルジェンタは不機嫌そうにため息をついた。彼女はコミッサーを見つめながら、強い決意をこめて言った。{/n}「ここで終わりではないぞ、イアコ・ソトニー。これは恩赦ではない…刑の執行を遅らせただけだ」
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに」{n}アルジェンタは不機嫌そうにため息をついた。彼女はコミッサーを見つめながら、強い決意をこめて言った。{/n}「ここで終わりではないぞ、イアコ・ソトニー。これは恩赦ではない…刑の執行を遅らせただけだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Como desee». {n}Argenta suspira con pesar. Mira con inquina al Comisario y dice con convicción:{/n} «No hemos terminado, Iako Sotniy. Esto no es un perdón, sino una sentencia aplazada».
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee». {n}Argenta suspira con pesar. Mira con inquina al Comisario y dice con convicción:{/n} «No hemos terminado, Iako Sotniy. Esto no es un perdón, sino una sentencia aplazada».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

languages.text: {n}Argenta pousse un soupir sinistre.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez. Nous sommes loin d'en avoir fini, Iako Sotniy, {n}ajoute-t-elle en lançant un regard noir au commissaire.{/n} Vous n'êtes pas pardonné. Simplement, la sentence sera rendue plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta pousse un soupir sinistre.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez. Nous sommes loin d'en avoir fini, Iako Sotniy, {n}ajoute-t-elle en lançant un regard noir au commissaire.{/n} Vous n'êtes pas pardonné. Simplement, la sentence sera rendue plus tard. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Argenta seufzt grimmig. Sie funkelt den Kommissar an und sagt voller Überzeugung:{/n} "Wir sind noch nicht fertig, Iako Sotniy. Das ist keine Begnadigung, nur eine verzögerte Bestrafung."
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Argenta seufzt grimmig. Sie funkelt den Kommissar an und sagt voller Überzeugung:{/n} "Wir sind noch nicht fertig, Iako Sotniy. Das ist keine Begnadigung, nur eine verzögerte Bestrafung."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nasıl istersen." {n}Argenta, kederle iç çekiyor. Komiser'e dik dik bakıp kararlı bir edayla konuşuyor.{/n} "Buradaki işimiz bitmedi İako Sotniy. Affedilmedin, yalnızca cezanın infazı ertelendi."
languages.original_text: "As you will." {n}Argenta sighs grimly. She glares at the Commissar and says with conviction,{/n} "We are not finished here, Iako Sotniy. This is not a pardon, merely a sentence stayed."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl istersen." {n}Argenta kederle iç çekiyor. Komiser'e dik dik bakıyor ve kararlı bir edayla konuşuyor:{/n} "Buradaki işimiz bitmedi İako Sotniy. Bu bir af değil. Cezan yalnızca ertelendi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
